title: E2E Test Suite (Playwright)
description: Create end-to-end test suite covering all critical user journeys across all hubs using Playwright.
acceptance_criteria: E2E: Shopping Hub — navigate → create sub-hub → select bubbles → manage master list → activate items → check off items
E2E: Home Tasks — navigate → create task → set urgency → verify urgent aggregation → complete task → clear completed
E2E: Vouchers — navigate → create voucher → view in grid → open modal → verify all data
E2E: Reservations — navigate → create reservation → view in grid → open modal → verify all data
E2E: Cross-hub navigation — visit each hub → verify data persistence → return to dashboard
E2E: Settings — change language → verify UI updates → change back
All E2E tests passing on Chrome (desktop + mobile viewport)
notes: Use Playwright's mobile viewport emulation for mobile tests. Consider recording traces for debugging failures.
